lmTest.name: Basic BISON Occurrences Test
lmTest.description: This is a simple test to make sure that BISON occurrence sets are created successfully
lmTest.jobXml: <job> <jobType>410</jobType> <processType>410</processType> <jobId>sampleBISONpoints</jobId> <parentUrl>None</parentUrl> <url>None</url> <userId>lm2</userId> <maxPoints>1000</maxPoints> <!-- Aimee, fill this in with a sample url --> <!-- http://bisonapi.usgs.ornl.gov/solr/occurrences/select/?q=decimalLongitude:[-125+TO+-66]+AND+decimalLatitude:[24+TO+50]+NOT+basisOfRecord:living+NOT+basisOfRecord:fossil+AND+hierarchy_homonym_string:*-100637-*&rows=5000000&json.nl=arrarr&wt=json &rows=5000000&json.nl=arrarr&wt=json--> <pointsUrl>http://bisonapi.usgs.ornl.gov/solr/occurrences/select/?q=decimalLongitude%3A%5B-125+TO+-66%5D+AND+decimalLatitude%3A%5B24+TO+50%5D+NOT+basisOfRecord%3Aliving+NOT+basisOfRecord%3Afossil+AND+hierarchy_homonym_string%3A%2A-100267-%2A</pointsUrl> </job>
